Articles.Content:
The two KSC flagpoles' flags are static. They had a waving animation in previous versions.

Exists in both career and sandbox.

To replicate: launch craft from VAB, look at the flagpole

KSP .25.0.642

exists in both 32-bit and 64-bit versions of KSP.

Win 7 Ultimate x64

I can provide logs if needed, but I don't know how to attach them.
I noticed this too, kinda annoying and looks strange.
Didn't know if this was a bug caused by something or if it was just left out of the .25 release, but it is very strange-looking.
I noticed this too. It is annoying me a bit.
agreed, this is just wrong. i just spotted it myself
